titles.title: Rural Community Hospital Demonstration Extension Act
A bill to amend the Medicare Prescription Drug, Improvement, and Modernization Act of 2003 to extend the Rural Community Hospital Demonstration Program.
Rural Community Hospital Demonstration Extension Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Rural Community Hospital Demonstration Extension Act - Amends the Medicare Prescription Drug, Improvement, and Modernization Act of 2003 to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) to extend for an additional five years the rural community hospital demonstration program.
